name: Paige Deckelbaum
text: The rooftop is the best! They did a great job of social distancing and keeping things clean. I felt really safe up there and it was much quieter than being on the street. Good food as always!

name: Jordan Fischer
text: Love the staff here, they're friendly and social. Good atmosphere and cozy rooftop dining area. Artwork on the menus and takeout boxes is incredible !!

name: Garland McCutchen
text: My wife and I have nothing but praise for the Mellow Mushroom Restaurant.   We have ordered from them several  times.  There Chef's Salads are the best in Washington.   There Pizza are delicious.  This is the only place we will eat now in ‚Ä¶More

name: Hannan Zafar
text: Amazing spot! Created my own pizza here and it came out great! Didn‚Äôt expect the pizza to be this good but it definitely left me impressed. Great ambiance and even better food. Highly recommended!

name: Sean-Tony Tescadero
text:
I went on a Tuesday, which apparently is trivia night. More on that later.
Place is nestled right in the high activity portion of the Adams Morgan strip, a door or two down from Tattoo Paradise. There's an upstairs, possibly a roof, ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason Blanchard
text: This is my favorite place to go when I travel to DC for work. I end up here a few of the days I'm in town. The pizza is fantastic. But, get the pretzels, they are amazing. Great selection of beer, kind staff, and it's in Adams Morgan, so after Mellow Mushroom, go to Tryst and get some great coffee and enjoy a night out in DC.

name: Charles Sekafetz
text: Decided to make a stop here to sit, talk, and have a nice pie. Even though it was busy, they had room for two more. Service was nice and did not seemed bothered that we stayed a little longer to continue our talk, but we compensated ‚Ä¶More

name: Idan F
text:
Really like this place.
Most of the time they have great atmosphere, good pizza & drinks.
This time we've unfortunately found some RATS running around looking for some ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Taylor
text: Big portions, extensive drink menu, and a friendly staff. This is a good spot for a well made pizza or pretzels. Another bonus for those looking for a good lunch is it seems to be one of the only spots regularly open for lunch during these week.

name: Eric Urquhart
text: Fantastic pizza, amazing pretzels, and a dope beer selection. And that's not all! They make some ridiculously good sandwiches as well. As a person who doesn't eat meat, Mellow Mushroom is my decadent wonderland.

name: Shaina Ziggler
text: Short staff and long wait is the reason they‚Äôre getting 3 stars. The food and drinks were good. I went out with friends on a Saturday during PorchFest in Adams Morgan (neighborhood bands- block party) and perhaps the restaurant wasn‚Äôt ‚Ä¶More

name: Elena Thier
text: We visited late at night on a Saturday and the place was busy but not over-crowded! We hiked up to the rooftop bar and it was a nice spot. Yes, the pizza is pricey but it's delicious! The great thing about this place is that the drinks are ‚Ä¶More

name: Rita Wilkerson
text: I love going to this pizza place when I'm in the area. Delicious pizza & a pretty good deals with wings/drinks. The only downfall is that they get very busy weekends.

name: Pablo A. Balmaseda
text: Friendly staff, good beer on tap, great pizza.

name: Wil Lyles
text: Pizza was great!  Get creative and build your own

name: D S
text:
Excellent food! Awesome Staff!  Highly Recommend

Visited with a large group and only gave them two hours notice.  They welcomed ‚Ä¶More

name: Cynthia Randolph
text: We missed happy hour, but snagged the 1/2 price wings! We tried jerk, thai chili and barbecue.  They were all fresh and flavorful!  Drinks were good too. Our waiter was wonderful!

name: Raf Den
text: It was kool. I liked the $5 lunch special pizza üçïüòÅ

name: Sarah Steele
text: Yum! Love this place. The staff is very friendly and the food is delicious!

name: O Becker
text: Love this place.   The ambiance is great.  Fun location.   Great staff.

name: Ricky Snoots
text: This place was awesome, they did not have trivia as scheduled but our server, Angela, was amazing and a great person to talk too.  We had an excellent time and can't wait to come back.  I highly recommend going to this restaurant and both ‚Ä¶More

name: Elise Webb
text: Fantastic pizza and great take out system.

name: Lady Pheonix 121
text: I love the cosmic karma pizza. Sorry no photos this time. I enjoyed every bite. Had a Cesar salad on the side and 2 blue moons. We sat outside and I was visited by many bees. I realized it's their season. I'll take pics the next time.

name: Chris DiGilio
text: Good pizza. Rats on the roof took off a star.

name: Jim Safley
text: Great beer selection matched with great pizza? Yes, this place will satisfy all your itches.

name: Paola Bernacchi
text: Great trivia on Tuesdays with Amit! Best pizza and pretzel bites and friendly service.

name: Jesse Varsalone
text: Mellow Mushroom is my fav. You have to pay for parking around here. The bar and restaurant is a lot smaller than most of the other bars that are by colleges.

name: Dave Anderson
text: Best pizza in Adams Morgan. Friendly staff. I don't like their putting parmesan on the pizza as a finish, so I always have to say "no parm". $5 cheese weekdays 11:30am - 3pm.

name: Udim Isang
text: Pizza was delicious. Service could've bee. Better, but he was swamped and his attitude reflected that.

name: SlyferGod
text: Service is amazing as well as the food

name: Chara The Designer
text: Collect pizza place. I love the staff and all. The bathrooms are great also. I love the resin sign to wash your hands that's a great personal touch. Adams Morgan is crazy busy and hard to find parking though. But it's all worth it. After your done having all that great pizza there's a whole buttload of other attractions in the are.

name: Dorea Reeser
text: I can't say enough about how much I love this place. I went here for dinner within a half hour of moving to DC, and everyone there was so positive and welcoming. I ordered a vegan pizza with avocado, black olives, Spinach, and tempeh. This ‚Ä¶More

name: Alan Huynh
text: Solid spot for pizza and drinks. The entire three floors are quite spacious, with each floor operating its own bar. The rooftop is one of the more comfortable rooftops in the Admo area, with plenty of seats and less crowding than its neighbors.

name: Guy Banks
text: Great service..friendly staff...clean good food and drinks...all around great atmostphere

name: Krys White
text: Always bomb!! Best pizza. The CRUST and the drinks here are unmatched

name: Nnamdi Obiako
text: Good pizza.  Good drinks. Good rooftop view. Good service. What else can you ask for in DC?

name: paxus calta
text: Good family place, fun staff, chatty customers

name: Osvaldo Guzman
text: Excellent pizza! üëç  Great rooftop.

name: Tim Norman
text: Placed a take out order that got lost in the shuffle. Seems like the host got cut early and didn't mention my order. That being said most of the employees on duty saw me and ignored me for the better part of an hour. Finally I went to ‚Ä¶More

name: Ranjit Sandhu
text: Good beer rude bartenders good spot to see locals

name: Jay Raju
text: Rooftop was great.  Kids had a great time.  Food and beer was on point.  Staff was very attentive.  Great place.

name: John Tolly
text: Seriously good pizza and a great tap selection

name: Chris Calvitto
text: Decent pizza and service.

name: Christopher McRoy
text: Maui Wowwie was everything I hoped for. Sweet and hot... pineapples, jerk chicken, banana peppers & more.  Service was great.

name: Erfaan C
text: Fine pizza üçï as usual

name: Colin Shenefield
text: Cool rooftop + 2 other floors. Gluten free options

name: Ben H
text: Chill vibe, wide selection of various Americanized Italian foods. Great if you go there with a large party and share multiple pizzas. My only gripe is that the service can be slow, however, in comparison to a lot of other places, it isn't too bad. The waitstaff is also super nice.

name: Jeff Watts
text: I'm a fan of Mellow Mushroom in general and this location didn't disappoint. If you just want pizza, there are better all around pizza joints in DC but MM has a wide variety of things which can really come in handy when getting food for a ‚Ä¶More

name: Gina Petrovitch
text: Best pizza I've ever had....

name: Jarvis Waller
text: Great pizza, really nice atmosphere. Great customer service. Drinks are superb. Clean tables. Rooftop is really nice to enjoy friends.

name: Chad Eary
text: I never write reviews but felt compelled after this mediocre meal. I ordered a steak salad (ribeye) with roasted mushroom trio. It came out  to $17.98, it said 12$ on the menu. They forgot salad dressing AND There is no way it was ribeye, ‚Ä¶More

name: Daniel Page
text: Service is friendly. No complaints.

name: By Goree
text: Omg the calzone is huge!!! Great taste...customer service was average. Would help if they had a sign tho order at the bar for late night. Great pizza. Would definitely reccomend and go again.

name: Jane Allen
text: Great atmosphere.   Good food... Awesome pizza!

name: steve peck
text:
Great pizza, gluten free base was excellent.
Superb service.

name: Ilhan Tanir
text: I ordered steak & cheese calzone. Not happy. Bread appeared not to be cooked well, and onions, green peppers not cooked in the steak. I haven't given up on this place yet. Perhaps it was a wrong night. Will try steak & cheese sandwich next ‚Ä¶More

name: Jennifer McFadden
text: The white pizza was very good. The mushroom soup was lukewarm, as was the meatball appetizer. Note to self, when at a pizza place.... get the pizza.

name: Paz Beniamini
text: A decent pizza place. The atmosphere is quite pleasant, and the prices are typical for the area. They also have a reasonable beer selection and some happy hour offers. The pizza itself was fine, but nothing extraordinary.

name: Chris B
text: Great pizza, great crust, but they're not cheap.

name: Andres Mendoza
text: Great pizza spot! They use really fresh high quality ingredients for their gluten free pizza. Great variety of choices. Also a really nice bar with alot of beer options.

name: Angela Garcia
text: My weakness... The best pizza, always love the unique environment of each MM, this one does not disappoint! Excellent, fast & friendly service every time! Always end up eating too much! For beer/bar people - large selection, beer club, ‚Ä¶More

name: Seth Byers
text: Nice and quiant. Decent and good beer selection that covers main spectrum of beer flavors. I was able to catch a free beer on the house from bleeding off a tap. (Lucky me!)  Personal pan pizza was great and the build your own small(?) salad was fantastic!  I will come back and get another salad for sure.

name: Nico Kwan
text: Spectacular pizza somewhere OTHER THAN NEW YORK!!! üçïüçïüçï Sooooo good

name: Jessica Gilfillan
text: Really fun bartender upstairs tonight. He was gregarious and knowledgeable about how to accommodate my gluten-free friend.

name: Richard Yhip
text: I strayed from my normal order of the House Special pizza and got half Mighty Meaty and half Rib Eye Pie.  I wasn't a huge fan of the Rib Eye but that's mostly personal preference.  The Mighty Meaty had all the meats but was a bit salty. ‚Ä¶More

name: Wes Reid
text: We were there today. Myself, my wife and our two kids with two friends from out of town. We ordered a large cheese pizza a salad and the artichoke dip. As we were eating our appetizer, my 7 year old son said he saw a rat moving across the ‚Ä¶More

name: Charles Kibby
text: Fun circus theme. Good staff and food

name: oh hey
text: If it's warm, sitting on Mellow Mushroom's roof is awesome!  The other locations are pretty nice too; it's a cool place to meet up with friends and grab a bite to eat.  I don't think the pizza is anything special, but it's certainly not bad ‚Ä¶More

name: Ktktkt Tktktk
text: An old favorite from college in LA. I was excited to eat there. While it was still good, they didnt have my favorite anymore, but things change in 15 years!

name: Tyler Caruthers
text: Good pizza and chill vibe.

name: Eduardo Llaurado Vizcarrondo
text:
Best pizza I have tasted, however I have never gone to the restaurant, I always use Uber eats for delivery
√ë

name: Michael Pipkin
text: Delicious artisan pies and a good drink selection.

name: Uriya Tenenbaum
text:
The place itself is okay overall.
I gave it 3 stars because it makes you feel lost as soon as you enter the place. the place was half empty yet we were not even noticed for couple of minutes. We ‚Ä¶More

name: Toomas Parratt
text: Laid back atmosphere with a great tap selection on happy hour. One of the few places you can get a $5 pint of cider. Not to mention the pizza is amazing.

name: Bryn R
text: Such good food! They easily seated a big group.  Good service and atmosphere.

name: Tara Mease
text: nice relaxed place, came for the gluten free pizza and enjoyed our time though crust didn't end up being a favorite. vv accommodating!

name: Sheila Gallogly
text: Waited to be seated on a Monday when the place was empty & the bartender just stood there & looked at us. Ordered Beers & no orange slices with the beer. Even after asking while my beer got warm for 20 minutes. Pizza was not even warm when ‚Ä¶More

name: Tye Kuzniczci
text: Good pizza and great customer service. I‚Äôve been a customer for years. :)

name: Terry Y. Morris
text: Always have loved this chain, fantastic pizza. Try the buffalo chicken pizza.

name: Beau Davis
text: Pizza and beer at a chain definitely worth knowing. Check it out if you don't know it. This is a cool location in DC for awesome pizza! Very good beer selection.

name: David Brenton
text: Went for March madness game. Beer selection was sub par compared to jack rose and smoke and barrel. Waited a bit for a beer. Bartender put half an ipa in and topped it off with a Kolsch on accident...mistakes happen, took ten minutes to get the ipa again. Was warm. Left shortly thereafter.

name: Will K
text: I love MM, but some people seem to hate the style of their pizza. I would consider it ‚Äúsouthern style‚Äù but I‚Äôm not sure if that‚Äôs an actual category of pizza. The dough is butter heavy and the pizza is extra cheesy, less emphasis on the ‚Ä¶More

name: Oscar A. Hernandez
text: A stone oven pizza in the rooftop is a great combination.

name: Kaitlyn Taylor
text: Great quality pizza like other locations I've been to.

name: Evelyn Denzel
text: Yummy,this is a special pizza place! We ordered a 16'' together and still couldn't finish it. The service was great and the location is also very nice. you can sit outside and watch the people! I highly recommend this restaurant!

name: Rui Li
text: Pretty cool to hang out before all the crazy parties start in Adams Morgan. The drink menu is decent as well. Staff is friendly and vibe is good.

name: Herbert Witzen
text:
Old artistic bar with upstairs balcony.
The place is in the center of the Adams Morgan corridor.  Tons of younger folks enjoying life.

name: AnneKathryn Dalton
text: This place has one of the best gluten free pizzas around! The craft beer selection is also very nice. Great views from the roof, if you can get a seat up there. It gets crowded on weekends, but is worth the wait.

name: C.A. S
text: A.  The food is always amazing, service is great, food comes out quickly, and the prices are good. ‚Ä¶More

name: Helder Toste
text: Great place for pizza but most importantly Trivia on Tuesday! It's lots of fun, and the hosts are enjoyable to hang out with. Show up early as it tends to be packed by 7:30.

name: RaeAnna Kirsch
text: We got there at the perfect time, snagged a booth. The pizza was good, and there were plenty of choices. The little kid with us loved the theme, and we got a kick out of it too.

name: Reece Couchman
text:
Visited several Mellow Mushroom restaurants before and experienced excellent service.  This one however was the polar opposite.
The restaurant was boiling hot (air con was definitely not on despite 95 degree ‚Ä¶More

name: Ibironke Abiodun
text: Very nice pizza, in fact the aroma alone is good to go

name: Alex Quin
text: I'm visiting from Miami and loved this place. I never leave reviews but I had to this time! Amazing experience. Food was delicious.

name: C. M.
text: Great good, great service and clean. Love this place. It can be costly but well worth it.

name: Megan M.
text: Great pizza, fantastic beer, nice people, fun atmosphere - what else can you say about Mellow Mushroom? Adams Morgan has a dearth of quality pizza places (sorry folks, Jumbo Slice doesn't count), and Mellow Mushroom certainly fills this ‚Ä¶More

name: Beatrice Montes
text: Outstanding pizzas, it was only one waiter (he was bartender an busboy as well) he could handle it pretty well, great service.

name: Charles Morrill
text: Went back again after three years, and I hate to say it, but the pizza is worse! Now you get plenty of mushrooms (hurray!) But now they slather it with "garlic aoli" otherwise known as mayonnaise. Yuk! Tastes more like bad Central American ‚Ä¶More

name: Ariana
text: The best vegan pizza in DC (fight me) it is expensive but is is a crowd pleaser for the veg and non veg crowd. The pizza reheats alright in tinfoil in the oven for next day left overs. ‚Ä¶More

name: Edgardo Pagan
text: Free Phish show and awesome Pizzaü§òüèºüòÉ

name: R W
text:
Best soft pretzels ever. If I could live just on them, I would.

(I got them to go, so this review is based solely on the food.)

name: Brian Merrell
text: DC isn't exactly the best town for pizza, but it's good to see this southern chain bring a cool atmosphere and tasty dough here. And they picked the perfect neighborhood -- Adams Morgan. There's a lot of flexibility with the menu and it's ‚Ä¶More

name: Oliver Sherouse
text: It's the place you remember from college, and in much the same way. Pizzas continue to be generous in size and reasonable tasty, and the beer list is adequate if unspectacular. While this location is in Adams Morgan, it doesn't seem to be *of* Adams Morgan, for those who find the distinction meaningful.

name: Todd Wheeler
text: Tasty food, good service, nice atmosphere that fits the city.

name: Daniel Miller
text: Great pizza, great hoagies, great beer, and we were with great people so it was great times

name: Nate Balogh
text: MM is huge in Denver so was super excited to find it Adams Morgan when I moved here. Same great taste and an even better staff! Thank you!

name: Q Humphries
text: The service was quick and the pizza was great! Our waitress was amazing! She never rushed us out due to watching the game. It was a great night.

name: Mischa Batiste
text: Very nice regional chain serving gourmet pizzas and craft beers, a bit too pricey for some of the pizzas, but a very good place overall. This particular one had 25 beers on tap... and luckily they rotate the beers a lot as well. If you like ‚Ä¶More

name: Anna Long
text: The design is so different than the Mellow Mushroom in Charlottesville! I love the booths, the artwork, and the exposed brick walls. Friendly and fast service. The food was great as well!

name: Tee Jay
text: I absolutely their pizza. I love that no matter the city, (Newport News, VA/Richmond, VA/Washington, DC), I visit them in the recipe is consistent and delicious. And the customer service never lets me down.

name: Veronica duran
text: Mellow mushroom has great pizza with a variety of toppings the interior design is very unique ad fun.

name: Will Campbell
text: The pizza here is really good. One of my favorite pizza joints of all time. Tons of kudos to them for that. ‚Ä¶More

name: Fulgencio Cruz
text: Very good always

name: Daniel Pekurovsky
text: Overall a very good restaurant. The customer service was fantastic and the food was amazing.

name: anfisa wilson
text: Amazing food, beer, ambiance, and service! And they will give you crayons!

name: Paul Myers
text: Despite an initial issue with the service. All was quickly sorted and the best gluten free pizza I've ever had ensued. Highly recommended and a great local find for us travelling Brits.

name: Shelly Lyn Marshall
text: Excellent Gluten Free options.

name: Brady Candell
text: Love this place!  The walls are all uniquely painted,  the servers are always smiling and helpful,  the food was good and catered to my picky vegan requests.  The prices were great and we left feeling happy and satisfied

name: Miguel Garza
text: Love the food. Great pizza, pretzels, beers and other drinks. Wish it had more of a fun bar scene, but the servers are nice and it's a great place to hang out low key with your friends

name: Brian Thiellen
text: Mellow Mushroom's pretzels are amazing. Start every meal with this buttery, doughy treat and you will leave happy regardless of what you choose for your main course. The pizza is also good but I was surprised by the wonderful pretzels.

name: Rhett Butler
text: Nice sized lunch "personal pizza." One of the few places open before 4 in Adam's Morgan/Kalorama.

name: Triana Yentzen
text: Very tasty pizza, very heavy though... could be a little lighter on the oil. Love the whole wheat dough!

name: Denise A
text:
The crust is sooo good.

And they have a good selection of beer. And the servers/bartenders are cool. ‚Ä¶More

name: Willem Koenders
text: My wife, her friend, and I visited after visiting the annual Zoolights. Interesting d√©cor - I liked the long, lower table on the ground floor, which seems like a massive kitchen table that you'd expect at your parents' place. ‚Ä¶More

name: Samad Sadri
text: Good food but they only get one star for being rude and cheap. They get busy and when they are busy the staff gets a little off hand. Some of their pizza toppings "are so good" that they count as two toppings. i.e. chicken.

name: Emmalyn Cochran
text: I will always love their pizza dough. It's so moist and delicious.

name: P Shukla
text: Great neighborhood place for pizza and beer. Warm and welcoming. Nice rooftop for summer days!

name: Danny Rhebel
text: Went up and had a late night bite to eat on their rooftop. Delicious vegan pizza! Staff was the most friendly as well!

name: Alain Parcan
text: Good food and a better beer selection but service is hit or miss.

name: Arun Sagar
text: Amazing place serving a good selection of beer and food. Absolutely loved the eclectic interiors and the atmosphere of the place. A very nice place to chill out with friends.

name: Jake
text: We ate on the rooftop.  Waitress was pleasant and attentive.  The wait for our food was a little long for what we ordered.  All-in-all, we had a nice experience and will likely want to go back next time we're in DC

name: Lindsay Benoit
text: Solid pizza, nice seating and great service. It's outside of our normal circle of travel for restaurants but it was worth the visit for sure.

name: Sarah B
text: After a long day of traveling this was just I needed. The food was great as was the service!

name: Genevieve Brammel
text:
We came in for happy hour, but they ended up charging us full price. When we asked, they said our orders are already in the system and could not fix it...? They offered free desert, but not our money back or free drinks.
Not going back.

name: Ilya Pekurovsky
text: Great pizza, very good service and good selection of craft beers

name: David Wolfand
text: Predictably delicious pizza and decent service. A great neighborhood go-to!

name: Yuri Tolmasoff
text: Great staff and food. Prices make it tricky to come back often, but I always enjoy eating and drinking there.

name: Micaiah G.
text: Best white pizza I've had in a while

name: Jose Miranda
text: The pizza was amazing, great music, great treatment from the staff, overall loved it, I highly recommend it to anyone who lives here or is traveling from home like myself.

name: Heather Parker
text: Loved their original crust and the pretzel bites!

name: Shankar Kulumani
text: Great beer and cider. The roof is perfect in the summer. Lots of close bike parking

name: John Charin
text: Happy Mellow has made it this far north. Great food and beers. Cool laid back atmosphere. You can't go wrong.

name: Janice Temple
text: There selection of pizza is pretty wide. I like the rooftop patio with the bar. We had great service with our waiter Patrick.

name: laya 4
text: Food was great and came in a timely manner the only problem was they didn‚Äôt give you napkins had to ask for them

name: oscar Bbbhh
text: I went to mellow mushroom the other day and to my surprise I heard squeaking that sounded like a loose grocery cart wheel. Since I‚Äôm a curious gentlemen I try to figure out what sound was so I follow to that kitchen area and when I open the the door i see 7 rats having intercourse  on a  pepperoni pizza.

name: Jose Garcia A Cut Above
text: We stopped in about 1:30pm and the restaurant was pretty empty - one table & 2 guys at the bar. We waited for someone to acknowledge us for several minutes and finally got seated at a table up front in the bar area. We sat for 7 minutes ‚Ä¶More

name: MKUU KAYA
text: Best pizza in town.

name: DuJuan Daniels
text: The bayou beer is delicious. The dessert pretzels wee more bland than we would've imagined, though. Decent beer selection. Service was a bit spotty since the bartender was the server for the entire 2nd floor. ‚Ä¶More

name: Zachary Morrison
text: The best pizza around.  No joke.  They literally have something for everyone (gluten free, vegetarians, meat lovers, etc) and a great selection of beers.  I don't normally eat crust, but I demolish theirs.  The calzones are to die for and ‚Ä¶More

name: Dmitry Saprykin
text: Mushroom soup is very tasty. We enjoyed all food very much.

name: Judy Wood
text: Good food.

name: Adam Teitelman
text: I love this place! Best food and friendly atmosphere.

name: Sabin Shah
text: Mellow Mushroom is definitely the best pizza in Adams Morgan, maybe in this area of DC. unique combinations, good salad, great beer list, good happy hour specials. And they have pitchers! late night happy hr as well. Good spot, top 5 spots for me in Adams Morgan

name: Gunjan Vatas
text: Great service and good food plus plenty of beers to choose from. Enjoyed hanging out on the roof deck.  Check out the mighty meat pizza.

name: Craig Thackray
text: Solid beer collection. Been to the mellow in Delray and gulf coast in Florida and always enjoyed the food. This one is more adult and is a bar of come to as a bar as well

name: Tom Fuentez
text: This place has amazing combos and great staff.  Different spots have their own "local pies" amazing

name: Charlotte Slaiman
text: Service is friendly though not especially competent. It's a real bummer that when the roof is open they don't open the second floor bathroom. You have to go down two flights of stairs every time  you use the bathroom. Very difficult on an ‚Ä¶More

name: Vitalii Dascaliuc
text: It's not pizza it's Digiorno!

name: David Young
text: Delicious pizza, including their gluten free and dairy free options. Great beer list too, featuring some awesome local brews.

name: Jose Otero
text: Great food and the server was so nice!

name: Susie Clark
text: Very good service. Food was...bad. Magarita pizza was actually too cheesy. It was a mess. Bacon on salad was almost raw. Sent it back for some that was actually cooked and got a plate of almost raw bacon. Ugh. The kicker came at the end, ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Melton-Grace
text: Friendly service with delicious pizzas. We barely had to wait for a table and received prompt and professional service.

name: Alex Reyes
text:
It is a nice restaurant with variety of beers, healthy food. Nice environment, courteous staff.
We will definitely be back

name: Muhammad Elgebali
text: Food and service were awesome and wait was way shorter than they originally announced

name: Scott Wolfe
text: Great food and ambiance.

name: animeviewer360
text: Fun place, nice staff, and great food! Well worth the trip.

name: Katie Pare
text: Wow great pizza!

name: kingswood pather
text: Great food and great service.

name: Pam Hickin
text: The pizzas were really tasty and the service was great too.

name: Mary Liberty
text: Great food and service

name: Julie Wallace
text: Great food service cool place all agez bar in there one side open late love it gotta go there food is awesome

name: gerald austin
text: Good pizza, good service!

name: Rick Coltman
text: Amazing pizza and salad!

name: Dana K
text: It's the only place I know where I can get a really tasty gluten and dairy - free pizza.

name: Tracy Dendy
text: Lively atmosphere and great pizza. Fantastic beer selection

name: Abe Roy
text: Great pizza and service.

name: Nathaniel Cartagena
text: The pizza is great and the rooftop deck is one of the best places to catch a meal when the weather is nice.

name: Katie Winner
text: Third Mellow Mushroom. Great place.

name: Ellie Davis
text: Super yummy guilty pleasure bar foods and pizzaaaa.

name: Jung-Ping Liu
text: Good pizza and beer

name: Adam Dehner
text: Outstanding in every way.  Huge fan.

name: shakib pourifarsi
text: Over priced for only decent pizza. The wait is also unbelievably long for a basic order

name: rodogg34
text: Food and drinks are okay. The staff is very nice and relax place to grab a quick one to eat.

name: Tom Moore
text: Good pizza. The rooftop is beautiful, but I can't handle the "bar" feel up there

name: Blair McKee
text: Great vegan options. Bruschetta was delicious. Their version of Moscow mule was the bomb.

name: Zoltan Wilson
text: Great pizza, and they have a roof deck.
